content: **crocheted star/christmas decoration in drops safran and drops glitter the piece is worked in the round middle outwards theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #dropsenchantedwish drops design pattern e-373 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** approx 7 cm from star-tip to star-tip **yarn** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 71 marzipan and use drops glitter from garnstudio 1 spool colour 01 gold 1 star weighs approx 4 g **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge** 24 treble crochets in width and 13 row in height with hook size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
